item.title: IOS command:IP classless
item.description: I wrote down this article in 2009-03-13 when I was looking for my first job. Taking this again today as preparation for CCNP. Topology: Topology Configuration Configured IP addresses on the routers Note: The subnets of R1’s Loopback1 and R2’s Loopback1 belong to the class A address. Execute command “ip classless” on both R1 and R2 (The command has been the default since IOS 11.3) Configure static routes R1(config)#ip route 0.
